projects.name: Humari Dukan: an e-commerce website
projects.description: Created an engaging e-commerce platform using React.js, utilized Redux for state management, and fakestoreAPI JSON for data and Bootstrap for appealing UI. Incorporated intuitive features such as image carousel, scroll animations, light/dark mode and bootstrap icons. Added search functionality, category-wise shopping and sorting functionality to find suitable products and robust checkout system user experience.

projects.name: Link Up: A platform to chat with friends
projects.description: Real-Time Chat Application Development: Designed and developed a real-time chat platform, leveraging HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, Socket.io, and Bootstrap. Interactive User Interface: Crafted an intuitive and visually appealing user interface using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap, ensuring optimal user engagement. Implemented dynamic features such as message updates in real-time, user presence indicators, and message notifications to enhance the interactive experience. Efficient Backend Architecture: Utilized Node.js and Socket.io to establish a robust backend infrastructure for real-time communication. Implemented efficient event-driven communication between clients and the server, ensuring low-latency message delivery and scalability to accommodate multiple users concurrently.

experiences.description: I Learnt JavaScript, React.Js, Node.Js, Express.Js, MongoDB skills during my internship at Upskillz. Utilized these skills to develop and optimize the performance of the movie catalog interface, reducing page load time by 20% and increasing overall user satisfaction. Collaborated with a team of developers to integrate advanced search functionality into Humari Dukan: an e-commerce,Note-Web-App resulting in a 25% increase in content discoverability and customer retention.
